source.created: A new Source is created with identifier {{ param }}
source.updated: A Source is updated with identifier {{ param }}
source.deleted: A Source is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Source {{ id }}?

source.sourceAlreadyAdded: This source has been already added in your list

error.sourceIdExists: A new source cannot already have a Source ID
error.sourceIsAssigned: Cannot transfer/delete a currently assigned source.
error.sourceRevisionIsAssigned:
Cannot transfer/delete a previosly assigned source.
NB this is a design issue, deletion/archival of outdated Sources should be addressed in the future.
error.sourceAssignedRequired: A new source must have the 'assigned' field specified.
error.validation: Validation error, check the entered values in the fields.
error.usedSourceDeletion: Cannot delete a source used by a subject
error.invalidTransfer: Cannot transfer a source to a project which doesn't have compatible source-type
